metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule idetifies when a new user created in Google Workspace

ruleText:
rule Google_W_user_creation 
{
  meta:
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule idetifies when a new user created in Google Workspace"
    severity = "Medium"

  events:

    $e.metadata.event_type = "USER_CREATION"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "CREATE_USER"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "WORKSPACE_ACTIVITY"
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "Google Workspace"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "admin"
    $e.principal.ip_geo_artifact.location.country_or_region = $source_country
    $e.principal.user.attribute.labels["actor_caller_type"] = "USER"
    $e.target.application = "Admin"
    $e.target.resource.resource_type = "SETTING"

 

  condition:
    $e
}
